snippet: The American insurance giant said it would use the proceeds from the sale of its remaining 13.7 per cent stake in Hong Kong-listed A.I.A. Group for general corporate purposes.
abstract: The American insurance giant said it would use the proceeds from the sale of its remaining 13.7 per cent stake in Hong Kong-listed A.I.A. Group for general corporate purposes.

headline.main: A.I.G. Sells Remaining Stake in Asian Insurer for $6.5 Billion
